quotes.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fal
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma â€“ which is living with the results of other people's thinking
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.quote: An unexamined life is not worth living
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: You become what you believe
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: I alone cannot change the world, but I can cast a stone across the water to create many ripples
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Winning isn't everything, but wanting to win is
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So, throw off the bowlines, sail away from safe harbor, catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore, Dream, Discover
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: First, have a definite, clear practical ideal; a goal, an objective. Second, have the necessary means to achieve your ends; wisdom, money, materials, and methods. Third, adjust all your means to that end.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Dreaming, after all, is a form of planning
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: I would rather die of passion than of boredom
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

quotes.quote: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.,
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.quote: If you're offered a seat on a rocket ship, don't ask what seat! Just get on
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.quote: I didn't fail the test. I just found 100 ways to do it wrong
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: I have learned over the years that when one's mind is made up, this diminishes fear
quotes.author: Rosa Parks

quotes.quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success
quotes.author: james Cameron
